data.actual_result: It remains at a lower resolution after logging into desktop remotely.
data.expected_result: Discord window should revert to the resolution specified on the desktop it is running on.
data.short_description: Discord window displays in incorrect resolution after logging into computer remotely using Windows remote desktop
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord window open on desktop. - Login to desktop through other PC or Android using Windows remote desktop. - Disconnect, and sign back into desktop. - Discord window will retain its remote resolution, whereas every other Windows application reverts to the current setting specified in Display settings.
